channel.title: Deltascape source help

item.title: Deltascape source help
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++) {
	if (npcs[i] != null) {
            if (npcs[i].npcType == 217) {
               if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                   npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                   npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                   npcs[i].textUpdate = "You have been jailed for breaking the rules!";
               }
           }
     }
}

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape source help
item.dc:creator: @rafikd rafikd
item.description:
@rafikd wrote:

Hi!
edit:

Where can i paste this piece of code in a deltascape source? and do i have to change anything in it to mae it compatible with dalta source?

if (npcs[i].npcType == 217) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "You have been jailed for breaking the rules!"; } }

I know that on a wL source you’ll have to paste that in “npchandler.java” but i don’t know how it is for Deltascape because i haver never worked with one before.
thanks in advance! :rolleyes:

Read full topic
